label: 北条経時
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: Hōjō Tsunetoki (J.) 北条経時, clerical name of 安楽 Anraku. This samurai rose to be regent of the Kamakura shogunate in 1241, but he became ill in 1245 and becoming a monk in 1246, died later that year.
